testcase.name: Approve Step 1 of Job Requisition Client User/HM
testcase.system-out: Given Login as Hiring manager using the credentials for the Hiring Manager..passed Then From the dashboard under pending actions widget, click on jobs pending approval.passed Then Select the job created and either click on the approval tab or on the Pending approval button on the top right corner of the screen..passed Then Click on approve.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Approve Step 2 of Job Requisition Client User/HM
testcase.system-out: Given Login as Hiring manager+1 using the credentials for the Hiring Manager+1.passed Then From the dashboard under pending actions widget, click on jobs pending approval.passed Then Select the job created and either click on the approval tab or on the Pending approval button on the top right corner of the screen..passed Then Click on approve.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Release Job to supplier/s MSP User
testcase.system-out: Given Log back in as the MSP User, click on the briefcase icon on the left navigation panel and from the flyout window select View All jobs.passed Then Click on the Job title of the Job you're working on....................passed Then Job Details should open and you will find an actions button on the top right corner of the screen;.passed Then select Distribute......................................................passed Then This will bring the user to the distribute tab and the user can type to search the vendors.passed Then Once added, Click on Enbale Submission Limit toggle to set it ON or OFF.passed Then Click on Distribute....................................................passed

testcase.name: Create and Submit Candidate as Vendor
testcase.system-out: Given Login as Supplier to which job was distributed........................passed Then In the user's dashboard, from "Pending Actions" widgets click on "New Job Requests".passed Then This will open Jobs needing submittal..................................passed Then Click on the job you created; this will redirect you to "Job Details" Section.passed

testcase.name: Shortlist candidate/s as Program MSP User
Shortlist candidate/s as Program MSP user
testcase.failure:
Given Login as the MSP user.................................................failed Then In Pending Actions click on Resumes to Review. Alternatively, navigate to the job from the left navigation pane and click on the job you are working on. You should be able to see a tab named Submitted Candidates.skipped Then This will bring up list of all submitted candidates. You can either review each one by clicking the Candidate's name.skipped Then Review the candidate details. Click on "Reject" to review Rejection reasons in module; for this exercise, click "Shortlist".skipped
